LODE Clarification for compliance YES IT IS AT THE EXCHANGES DISCRETION The exchange used 20 price as their sustained price to maintain The precedent is that maintaining above the average of the requested sustained price will regain compliance The exchange cant just apply different standards to different companies that would cause chaos This stock is compliant any other way of looking at this is wack
